participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily enjoys sharing her passions and dreams with others. She has a strong sense of family and is always looking for ways to inspire her kids.
participant_1.background: I have a dog named Petrucci who always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh. I am a mother of two beautiful boys. I only eat organic food. I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business. I still dream about going to Paris and designing clothes.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Energetic and social, Samantha loves to engage with others and share her creative pursuits. She balances her interests between appearances and fun experiences.
participant_2.background: I want to cosplay as my favorite superhero at Comic Con with my husband. I do care about my appearance, but it's not my main focus. I love watching Silicon Valley and making videos for my YouTube channel. I like to party. My paddle board is calling my name.

content.text: Oh cool! I have watched some of that. Not a lot though.
Its a good show! I like to make videos for my YouTube channel about it.
Oh wow thats cool! What kind of videos do you make?
I make videos about the latest episodes. I also make cosplay videos.
That sounds fun! I cosplay too! I want to go to Comic Con with my husband one day.
Oh thats awesome! I love cosplaying! I wish I could go to Comic Con with my husband too.
Do you have a favorite superhero?
I like Wonder Woman. She's so badass!
She is! I like Captain Marvel a lot too.
Oh cool! They have a lot of Marvel stuff at Comic Con. I would love to get a Captain Marvel cosplay costume.
Yeah they do! I would love to get a Wonder Woman cosplay costume.
We should go together one year! We could do a Wonder Woman and Captain Marvel cosplay.
That would be so much fun! I would love to do that.
